values: Danger Averted, Destiny Attained: Funeral Message for Lois Nelson (1919–2023)Danger Averted, Destiny Attained: Funeral Message for Lois Nelson (1919–2023)

When a Christian goes home to be with the Lord, we who remain have the chance to rehearse God’s loving design in every believer’s death.When a Christian goes home to be with the Lord, we who remain have the chance to rehearse God’s loving design in every believer’s death.
